name: Time and Time Again (Theory_of_Everything)
description:
Time and Time Again is a Game made in a week for the PB Game Jam 4.

This game is a puzzle Game about finding the sneaky clues hidden in its enviroment.

Controls:

W A S D : Move around
Esc : Open Menu

Created by the Crabrotory Team:

Theory_of_Everything [itch.io]

ThunderStorm7S [itch.io]

Orangoose [itch.io]
